title: Snips Microwave Plate Bell, 26.2 x 26.2 x 7.6 cm, Colour Red and Transparent, Lid Cover for Food, Made in Italy, Plastic
features: CLEAN MICROWAVE: Introducing our premium microwave plate cover for food, a must-have accessory for your kitchen! This versatile microwave cover is designed to fit most standard microwave plates and acts as a reliable microwave splatter guard, keeping your microwave clean. Whether you're cooking or reheating, our microwave lid cover ensures a hassle-free experience by preventing spills and messes.

VERSATILE: Crafted with a sturdy and heat-resistant construction, this microwave splatter cover for food effectively prevents splatters and spills. Its transparent design allows you to monitor your food without removing the cover. The bell also allows you to cover the foods on the table, preserving the heat longer while waiting to be consumed. It is also a handy accessory in the refrigerator, to ensure that the smells and flavors of your dish are not contaminated by other foods.

FUNCTIONAL: Upgrade your microwave cooking experience with our premium microwave cover for food. Whether you're reheating leftovers or cooking a quick meal, our microwave food cover lid ensures even heating while preventing messy splatters. With our microwave plate covers for food, you can enjoy safe and worry-free microwave cooking. Once used, the product can be washed both by hand and in the dishwasher.

SAFETY AND QUALITY, 100% MADE IN ITALY: Snips products have a Made in Italy Design, Technologies and Quality. SNIPS uses a special latest generation material that does not release flavours and odours and does not alter the quality of food, they are 0% BPA and phthalate free. Subjected to the strictest food safety controls, products are all certified by the TUV RHEINLAND International Institute.
description: From the manufacturer TO MICROWAVE: PLATE COVER While heating the food, it prevents the microwave from splashing and greasy. You can also use it on the table , to keep food warm while waiting to eat it. You can use it in the refrigerator , to cover dishes ready or to cook. Equipped with space-saving knob and colored rubber seal on the edge to make it even more practical to use. Wash it comfortably in the dishwasher , whenever you want, without problems of plastic distortion. It’s a product designed to be used daily and last. THE PLUS OF PLATE COVER SPACE-SAVING KNOB To give you a comfortable grip even with wet or greasy hands. The flat shape ensures that other containers or dishes can be stacked on the product. RUBBER SEAL To ensure a perfect adherence on all surfaces and keep longer the heat of food. HOLES FOR THE STEAM The pre-drilled shell helps steam escape, a fundamental precaution especially when heating food in the microwave. FLEXIBILITY & PRACTICALITY MICROWAVE Ideal for heating food: avoid splashes and drops to dirty the appliance chamber. REFRIGERATOR You can use it on the shelves of the refrigerator to protect cooked food or to cook, it helps to preserve its freshness. DISHWASHER Wash by hand or in the dishwasher as many times as you need, without fear of plastic distortion.
